en: Natsume Soseki is one of the best writers in Japan.
zh: 夏目漱石是日本最伟大的作家之一。

en: The summer goods are now on sale.
zh: 夏季商品现在正在打折。

en: Why don't you wear summer clothes?
zh: 你为什么不穿夏装呢？

en: The summer grass covers the ground.
zh: 夏天的草覆盖着地面。

en: Tokyo is subject to typhoons in summer.
zh: 东京夏天容易遭受台风侵袭。

en: I was away from home all through the summer vacation.
zh: 整个暑假我都不在家。

en: I usually went to bed at ten during the summer vacation.
zh: 暑假期间我通常十点睡觉。

en: I visited Hokkaido during summer vacation.
zh: 暑假期间我去了北海道。

en: I'm thinking of going to the States during the summer vacation.
zh: 我正在考虑暑假期间去美国。

en: They visited us at the camp during summer vacation.
zh: 暑假期间，他们来营地拜访我们。

en: What do you say to making a trip with me during the summer vacation?
zh: 暑假期间和我一起去旅行怎么样？

en: The summer vacation has come to an end, and we will have to go back to school.
zh: 暑假结束了，我们不得不回到学校。

en: Summer vacation is near. Can you think of a good place for the holidays?
zh: 暑假快到了。你能想到一个适合度假的好地方吗？

en: The summer vacation is only a week away.
zh: 暑假只有一周的时间了。

en: We have five days to go before the summer vacation.
zh: 离暑假还有五天。

en: Summer vacation begins next Monday.
zh: 暑假下周一开始。

en: Summer vacation is near at hand.
zh: 暑假即将来临。

en: The summer vacation ended all too soon.
zh: 暑假结束得太快了。

en: Did you go anywhere during the summer vacation?
zh: 暑假期间你去哪里了吗？

en: How's your summer vacation going?
zh: 你的暑假过得怎么样？

en: How was your summer vacation?
zh: 你的暑假怎么样？

en: What did you do with your summer vacation?
zh: 你的暑假做了什么？

en: The summer vacation has come to an end too soon.
zh: 暑假结束得太快了。

en: The summer vacation begins in July.
zh: 暑假在七月开始。

en: The summer vacation lasts a couple of weeks.
zh: 暑假持续几个星期。

en: We have experienced many changes over the last decade.
zh: 在过去的十年里，我们经历了许多变化。

en: In a past-oriented society, people dwell on the past and on tradition.
zh: 在一个以过去为导向的社会里，人们沉湎于过去和传统。

en: We can record the past and present.
zh: 我们可以记录过去和现在。

en: It is considered impossible to travel back to the past.
zh: 人们认为不可能回到过去。

en: We can know the past, but the future we can only feel.
zh: 我们可以了解过去，但未来我们只能感受。

en: Don't dwell on your past mistakes!
zh: 不要沉溺于过去的错误！

en: Don't dwell on your past failures.
zh: 不要沉溺于过去的失败。

en: Don't grieve about your past errors.
zh: 不要为过去的错误而悲伤。

en: My past indiscretions are coming back to haunt me.
zh: 我过去的轻率行为正在回来困扰我。

en: Stop clinging to your glory days, or you'll be left behind.
zh: 不要再沉迷于你过去的辉煌了，否则你会落后的。

en: Don't worry about the past.
zh: 不要担心过去。

en: One day I strolled into the woods.
zh: 有一天我漫步走进树林。

en: Have you ever had any serious illness?
zh: 你有没有得过什么大病？

en: In the past, Fletcher Fuel was approached by Japanese companies.
zh: 过去，弗莱彻燃料公司曾与日本公司接触过。

en: You must live in the present, not in the past.
zh: 你必须活在当下，而不是过去。

en: Women had little choice in the past.
zh: 过去，女性几乎没有选择。

en: In the past, the old used to be looked upon as experts in solving various problems of life.
zh: 过去，老年人被认为是解决各种生活问题的专家。

en: Our policy is to build for the future, not the past.
zh: 我们的政策是为未来建设，而不是过去。

en: Although CFIT accounted for just over a third of crashes in the past six years, it caused 53% of the deaths.
zh: 虽然过去六年里，可控飞行撞地事故仅占坠机事故的三分之一多一点，但却造成了53%的死亡。

en: We haven't had a price increase in the last five years.
zh: 在过去的五年里，我们没有涨过价。

en: Prices have risen by 50 percent during the past ten years.
zh: 在过去的十年里，价格上涨了百分之五十。

en: It's never too late to make amends.
zh: 亡羊补牢，为时未晚。

en: He who makes no mistakes makes nothing.
zh: 不犯错误的人什么也做不成。

en: In days gone by, things were different.
zh: 在过去的日子里，情况不一样。

en: It is no use crying over spilt milk.
zh: 覆水难收，后悔无用。

en: Our interests seem to conflict with each other.
zh: 我们的利益似乎互相冲突。

en: Our interests clash with theirs.
zh: 我们的利益和他们的利益相冲突。

en: We cannot make a change in our schedule.
zh: 我们无法更改我们的日程安排。

en: Let's drink a toast to our friends!
zh: 让我们为我们的朋友们干杯！

en: Our friendship did not last.
zh: 我们的友谊没有持续下去。

en: Our friendship remained firm.
zh: 我们的友谊依然坚定。

en: Our baseball diamond is very small.
zh: 我们的棒球场非常小。

en: Our problem is how to get in touch with him.
zh: 我们的问题是如何与他取得联系。

en: Our eyes take time to adjust to the darkness.
zh: 我们的眼睛需要时间来适应黑暗。

en: Cars are running one after another before our eyes.
zh: 汽车一辆接一辆地从我们眼前驶过。

en: We have the edge on them.
zh: 我们比他们有优势。

en: Our insurance policy covers various kinds of damages.
zh: 我们的保险单涵盖各种损害。

en: Our flight was canceled.
zh: 我们的航班被取消了。

en: In our culture, we can't be married to two women at once.
zh: 在我们的文化中，我们不能同时娶两个女人。

en: In our culture, a man is allowed to be married to only one wife at a time.
zh: 在我们的文化中，一个男人一次只能娶一个妻子。

en: Our total debts amount to ten thousand dollars.
zh: 我们的总债务达一万美元。

en: Our plane took off exactly on time at six.
zh: 我们的飞机在六点准时起飞。

en: I have a strong conviction that our judgement was right.
zh: 我坚信我们的判断是正确的。

en: Our bodies are our gardens, to which our wills are gardeners.
zh: 我们的身体是我们的花园，而我们的意志是园丁。

en: All our things were turned upside down.
zh: 我们所有的东西都被翻了个底朝天。

en: Our ownership in the company is 60%.
zh: 我们公司占股60%。

en: Even our brains are all subject to the laws of physics.
zh: 即使我们的大脑也受到物理定律的支配。

en: Our efforts did not result in success.
zh: 我们的努力没有取得成功。

en: All our effort ended in failure.
zh: 我们所有的努力都以失败告终。

en: All our efforts were in vain.
zh: 我们所有的努力都是徒劳的。

en: The company has growing pains now.
zh: 公司现在正经历成长的烦恼。

en: The company is turning to export markets to make up for a decline in domestic sales.
zh: 公司正转向出口市场，以弥补国内销售额的下降。

en: The office has been topsy-turvy since the merger upset everything.
zh: 自从合并扰乱了一切，办公室就一直乱七八糟的。

en: The community is made up of individuals.
zh: 这个社区由个人组成。

en: The company took action against its former accountant.
zh: 公司对其前会计采取了行动。

en: The company is in financial difficulties.
zh: 公司正面临财务困难。

en: The firm has a great deal of trust in your ability.
zh: 公司非常信任你的能力。

en: The company managed to keep afloat.
zh: 公司设法维持运营。

en: The company plans to close its U.S. sales unit in New York.
zh: 该公司计划关闭其位于纽约的美国销售部门。

en: The company bought shares in the venture.
zh: 公司购买了该合资企业的股份。

en: The company abandoned that project.
zh: 公司放弃了那个项目。

en: The company drew back from the project.
zh: 公司从该项目中撤回。

en: The company was in want of money.
zh: 公司当时很缺钱。

en: The company called in all the baby food made in July.
zh: 公司召回了七月份生产的所有婴儿食品。

en: The company went after its no. 1 customer gripe: power outages.
zh: 公司着手解决其头号客户抱怨的问题：停电。

en: The company's gamble paid off.
zh: 公司的赌博获得了回报。

en: The company's profits soared.
zh: 公司的利润飙升。

en: It took me several days to balance the company books.
zh: 我花了几天时间才平衡了公司的账目。

en: This company owes its success to him.
zh: 这家公司的成功归功于他。

en: In some companies, employees use paid holidays for their summer vacations.
zh: 在一些公司，员工用带薪假期来度暑假。

en: Some of the company's executives are out of town for a conference.
zh: 公司的一些高管出差参加会议。

en: Scott's job is to evaluate the assets of companies.
zh: 斯科特的工作是评估公司的资产。

en: The office manager will explain to the new typist where she should work and what she should do.
zh: 办公室经理会向新打字员解释她应该在哪里工作以及应该做什么。

en: My responsibility is to keep the company solvent.
zh: 我的责任是保持公司偿付能力。

en: We used to meet at a coffee shop in Shinjuku after work.
zh: 我们过去常常在下班后在新宿的一家咖啡店见面。

en: Easter will soon come around.
zh: 复活节快到了。

en: I hope it won't be long before I can see you again.
zh: 我希望很快就能再次见到你。

en: It's going to clear up soon.
zh: 天气很快就会放晴了。

en: It will not be long before we meet again.
zh: 我们很快就会再次见面。

en: We will soon be ready for the party.
zh: 我们很快就会为派对做好准备。

en: A hedge between keeps friendship green.
zh: 君子之交淡如水。

en: Let us settle the matter without a third party.
zh: 我们自己解决这件事，不要牵扯第三方。

en: A fence between makes love more keen.
zh: 小别胜新婚。

en: I'm afraid not.
zh: 恐怕不行。

en: I just hope it makes it in time.
zh: 我只希望它能及时赶到。

en: I didn't think you were going to make it.
zh: 我没想到你能赶到。

en: Walk fast so as to be in time.
zh: 快走，以便及时赶到。

en: To be on time, I ran.
zh: 为了准时，我跑了。

en: We're counting on you to wake us up in time, so don't fall asleep.
zh: 我们指望你及时叫醒我们，所以别睡着了。

en: Send me the account.
zh: 把账单寄给我。

en: Do you think we can get there in time?
zh: 你觉得我们能及时赶到那里吗？

en: You look very dignified.
zh: 你看上去很庄重。

en: Investigators are trying to pin down the cause of today's fire.
zh: 调查人员正在努力查明今天火灾的原因。

en: The audience was excited at the game.
zh: 观众对这场比赛感到兴奋。

en: The crowd may be on the side of Luciano, but the champ has got the skill to win and that's what matters.
zh: 观众可能支持卢西亚诺，但冠军有获胜的技巧，这才是最重要的。

en: All the audience was excited.
zh: 所有的观众都很兴奋。

en: Observation is a passive science, experimentation an active science.
zh: 观察是一种被动的科学，实验是一种主动的科学。

en: Visiting all the tourist sights really wore me out.
zh: 参观所有的旅游景点真让我筋疲力尽。

en: The tourists were fascinated with the exquisite scenery.
zh: 游客们被这美丽的景色迷住了。

en: Local shops do good business with tourists.
zh: 当地商店靠游客生意兴隆。

en: Hurry up, and you will be able to catch the train.
zh: 快点，你就能赶上火车了。

en: Hurry up, and you'll catch the train.
zh: 快点，你就能赶上火车了。

en: Make haste, and you will be in time.
zh: 快点，你就能及时赶到。

en: Hurry up, and you will be in time for school.
zh: 快点，你就能及时赶到学校。

en: Hurry up, and you will be in time for the bus.
zh: 快点，你就能及时赶上公交车。

en: Hurry up, and you can catch the bus.
zh: 快点，你就能赶上公交车。

en: Hurry up, or you'll miss the train.
zh: 快点，不然你会错过火车的。

en: Make haste, or you will be late.
zh: 快点，不然你会迟到的。

en: Hurry up, or you'll be late.
zh: 快点，不然你会迟到的。

en: Hurry up, or you will miss the bus.
zh: 快点，不然你会错过公交车的。

en: More haste, less speed.
zh: 欲速则不达。

en: Be quick, or you will miss the train.
zh: 快点，不然你会错过火车的。

en: You must hurry up, or you will miss the express.
zh: 你必须快点，不然你会错过快车的。

en: Unless you hurry, you will be late for school.
zh: 除非你快点，否则你上学要迟到了。

en: You can take your time.
zh: 你可以慢慢来。

en: We've got to hurry. Mr Itoh will call the roll.
zh: 我们得快点。伊藤先生要点名了。

en: Hurry, or you'll miss the train.
zh: 快点，不然你会错过火车的。

en: Hurry up, otherwise you'll be late for lunch.
zh: 快点，不然你午饭就要迟到了。

en: Hurry or we'll never make the train!
zh: 快点，不然我们永远赶不上火车了！

en: Hurry up, or it will start raining.
zh: 快点，不然就要下雨了。

en: You'll miss the train if you don't hurry.
zh: 如果你不快点，你就会错过火车的。

en: If you don't hurry, you'll miss the train.
zh: 如果你不快点，你就会错过火车的。

en: Don't dash off a sloppily written report filled with mistakes.
zh: 不要匆匆忙忙地写一份充满错误的报告。

en: You make mistakes if you do things in a hurry.
zh: 如果你匆忙行事，你就会犯错。

en: Please hurry and finish the prospectus.
zh: 请快点完成招股说明书。

en: Our train stopped suddenly.
zh: 我们的火车突然停了。

en: Why don't we drive out to the country for a change of pace?
zh: 我们为什么不开车去乡下换换心情呢？

en: Let's take a walk for a change.
zh: 我们出去散散步，换换心情吧。

en: Mother advised me to take a walk for a change.
zh: 妈妈建议我出去散步，换换心情。

en: Let's eat out for a change.
zh: 我们出去吃吧，换换口味。

en: Let's take a break for a change.
zh: 我们休息一下，换换脑子吧。

en: I wish you would take me to a restaurant for a change.
zh: 我希望你能带我去餐馆吃一顿，换换口味。

en: Are you feeling sick?
zh: 你觉得不舒服吗？

en: Are you feeling OK?
zh: 你觉得还好吗？

en: If you need a change of pace, why don't you come for a visit?
zh: 如果你需要换换心情，为什么不来拜访一下呢？

en: We are having a whale of a time.
zh: 我们玩得很开心。

en: How do you feel now?
zh: 你现在感觉怎么样？

en: When he feels fine, he goes for a walk.
zh: 他感觉好的时候，就会去散步。

en: When I feel fine, I go for a walk.
zh: 我感觉好的时候，就会去散步。

en: Not feeling well, I stayed home all day.
zh: 因为感觉不舒服，我整天都待在家里。

en: I'm not feeling well.
zh: 我感觉不舒服。

en: I can't see you today because I feel ill.
zh: 我今天不能见你，因为我感觉不舒服。

en: I'm not up for it.
zh: 我没心情做。

en: I felt ill and was admitted to the hospital, but in the event, it was nothing serious.
zh: 我感觉不舒服，被送进了医院，但结果证明没什么大碍。

en: Sick and tired, she went to bed early.
zh: 她感到厌烦，很早就上床睡觉了。

en: Not feeling well, I stayed home on that day.
zh: 那天我感觉不舒服，所以待在家里。

en: Do you feel sick?
zh: 你觉得不舒服吗？

en: Because she felt sick.
zh: 因为她觉得不舒服。

en: I don't feel well. Could you give me some medicine?
zh: 我感觉不舒服。你能给我一些药吗？

en: Not being well, she stayed home.
zh: 因为身体不舒服，她待在家里。

en: I will see to it that you meet her at the party.
zh: 我会确保你在聚会上见到她。

en: Say what you will, I think he is an honest person.
zh: 随便你怎么说，我认为他是个诚实的人。

en: I will help him no matter what you say.
zh: 不管你怎么说，我都会帮助他。

en: Say what you will; I won't change my mind.
zh: 随便你怎么说，我都不会改变主意。

en: I marvel how you could agree to the proposal.
zh: 我很惊讶你怎么会同意这个提议。

en: It is obvious why you have a stomach-ache.
zh: 你为什么肚子疼，这很明显。

en: I can imagine how you felt.
zh: 我能想象你的感受。

en: However fast you may walk, you can't catch up with him.
zh: 无论你走得多快，你也赶不上他。

en: Try as you may, you will not be able to read as many as five novels in a day.
zh: 无论你怎么努力，你一天也读不了五本小说。

en: Try to estimate how much you spent on books.
zh: 试着估计一下你在书上花了多少钱。

en: I have a good mind to strike you for being so rude.
zh: 我很想打你，因为你太粗鲁了。

en: No matter where you may go, don't forget to write to me.
zh: 无论你去哪里，都不要忘记给我写信。

en: I must go there irrespective of what you think.
zh: 不管你怎么想，我都必须去那里。

en: You should have nothing to complain about.
zh: 你应该没有什么可抱怨的。

en: No wonder you could not open the door.
zh: 难怪你打不开门。

en: What is it that makes you think that way?
zh: 是什么让你那样想？

en: I'm surprised at your behavior.
zh: 我对你的行为感到惊讶。

en: It's strange you say that.
zh: 你说的真奇怪。

en: I will do my best to put such an idea out of your head.
zh: 我会尽力让你打消这个念头。

en: How can I feel relaxed, with you watching me like that?
zh: 你那样盯着我，我怎么能放松呢？

en: I can't abide hearing you cry so bitterly.
zh: 我受不了听你哭得这么伤心。

en: It is outrageous that you should spend so much money.
zh: 你花这么多钱真是太离谱了。

en: It is a pity that you should lose such a chance.
zh: 你失去这样的机会真是太可惜了。

en: It is foolish of you to believe such a thing.
zh: 你相信这种事真是太傻了。

en: It's absurd of you to do that.
zh: 你这样做真是太荒谬了。

en: You have a tendency to talk too fast.
zh: 你说话总是很快。

en: Life lies in front of you.
zh: 生活就在你眼前。

en: Don't you have a sense of justice?
zh: 你难道没有正义感吗？

en: You have many caring friends.
zh: 你有很多关心你的朋友。

en: You are very trying to me sometimes.
zh: 有时候你真让我受不了。

en: I expect you to be punctual.
zh: 我希望你准时。

en: You got me!
zh: 你抓到我了！

en: Can't you understand the pain of your parents?
zh: 你难道不能理解你父母的痛苦吗？

en: There is nothing wrong with you.
zh: 你没有任何问题。

en: You have a gift for music.
zh: 你有音乐天赋。

en: I can't lie to you.
zh: 我不能对你撒谎。

en: I can't hide the fact from you.
zh: 我无法对你隐瞒这件事。

en: You make me feel so guilty.
zh: 你让我感到非常内疚。

en: I've given up on you!
zh: 我对你放弃了！

en: You have the advantage of a good education.
zh: 你拥有受过良好教育的优势。

en: I expect you to work harder.
zh: 我希望你更努力工作。

en: There are few high-ranking positions left open for you.
zh: 留给你的高职位不多了。

en: You are entitled to try once again.
zh: 你有权再试一次。

en: You are hopeless.
zh: 你没救了。

en: You have a good friend in me.
zh: 你有一个好朋友，那就是我。

en: I bear no grudge against you.
zh: 我对你不怀恨在心。

en: I'm afraid this job is too much for you.
zh: 恐怕这份工作对你来说太难了。

en: I expect you know all about it.
zh: 我希望你了解所有关于这件事的信息。

en: You have no business doing it.
zh: 你没资格做这件事。

en: You deserve the prize.
zh: 你值得这个奖。

en: The sea was running high.
zh: 海面波涛汹涌。

en: The sea was as smooth as glass.

en: You may go anywhere.
zh: 你可以去任何地方。

en: What time are you going on duty?
zh: 你几点上班？

en: What time will you get to the station?
zh: 你几点能到车站？

en: You're too suspicious about everything.
zh: 你对一切都太疑神疑鬼了。

en: How many books do you have?
zh: 你有多少本书？

en: What are you looking for?
zh: 你在找什么？

en: What are you looking at?
zh: 你在看什么？

en: What do you learn?
zh: 你学什么？

en: What do you intend to do?
zh: 你打算做什么？

en: You have put everything out of order.
zh: 你把一切都弄乱了。

en: What are you going to be?
zh: 你将来想做什么？

en: What do you want to be?
zh: 你想做什么？

en: What will you have?
zh: 你要什么？

en: What are you going to have?
zh: 你打算要什么？

en: There is no reason why you shouldn't do such a thing.
zh: 你没有任何理由不做这件事。

en: I don't blame you.
zh: 我不怪你。

en: I can't allow you to do that.
zh: 我不能允许你那样做。

en: There are a good many reasons why you shouldn't do it.
zh: 你有很多理由不应该那样做。

en: I don't blame you for doing that.
zh: 我不怪你做这件事。

en: We will pay you according to the amount of work you do.
zh: 我们会根据你的工作量付给你工资。

en: I'm glad you enjoy skiing, but I guess it's just not my cup of tea.
zh: 我很高兴你喜欢滑雪，但我想这不适合我。

en: I'll do everything you tell me to do.
zh: 我会做你告诉我的所有事情。

en: Your conduct is absolutely shameful.
zh: 你的行为太可耻了。

en: I cannot see you behaving like that.
zh: 我无法接受你那样的行为。

en: I didn't expect you to get here so soon.
zh: 我没想到你这么快就到了。

en: It was too bad you couldn't come.
zh: 你没能来真是太可惜了。

en: It's a pity that you couldn't come.
zh: 你没能来真是太遗憾了。

en: It is easy for you to solve this problem.
zh: 你很容易解决这个问题。

en: You wrote this book?
zh: 这本书是你写的？

en: I didn't know that you were in this town.
zh: 我不知道你在这个镇上。

en: It is dangerous for you to swim in this river.
zh: 你在这条河里游泳很危险。

en: It is out of the question for you to go to New York this weekend.
zh: 你这个周末去纽约是不可能的。

en: It is very difficult for you to do this work.
zh: 你做这项工作非常困难。

en: The time will come when you will understand this.
zh: 总有一天你会明白这个的。

en: Where was it that you found this key?
zh: 你是在哪里找到这把钥匙的？

en: I didn't expect you to turn up here.
zh: 我没想到你会出现在这里。

en: There is no need for you to stay here.
zh: 你没有必要留在这里。

en: As long as you're here, I'll stay.
zh: 只要你在这里，我就会留下。

en: With you here beside me I'm not afraid of anything. You're my fortress.
zh: 有你在我身边，我什么都不怕。你就是我的堡垒。

en: You will have your own way.
zh: 你会走出自己的路的。

en: What woke you up?
zh: 什么把你吵醒了？

en: You want to have a finger in every pie, don't you?
zh: 你什么都想插一脚，是不是？

en: What did you come here so early for?
zh: 你这么早来这里做什么？

en: You've worked hard for months and have certainly earned a holiday.
zh: 你辛苦工作了好几个月，当然应该休个假。

en: Please let me know what you want.
zh: 请告诉我你想要什么。

en: I wonder if you have something to write with.
zh: 我想知道你有没有什么可以写字的东西。

en: What do you like?
zh: 你喜欢什么？

en: You seem to be thinking of something else.
zh: 你好像在想别的事情。

en: Do you belong to any clubs?
zh: 你参加什么俱乐部吗？

en: Do you love music?
zh: 你喜欢音乐吗？

en: You really have an ear for music.
zh: 你真有音乐天赋。

en: You are not a coward.
zh: 你不是懦夫。

en: You dropped your pencil.
zh: 你的铅笔掉了。

en: Do you have any pencils?
zh: 你有铅笔吗？

en: First, you have to stop smoking.
zh: 首先，你必须戒烟。

en: It is necessary for you to stop smoking.
zh: 你必须戒烟。

en: Are you not able to speak English?
zh: 你不会说英语吗？

en: Do you study English?
zh: 你学英语吗？

en: All you have to do is try hard to master English.
zh: 你所要做的就是努力掌握英语。

en: Did you try to review the English lessons?
zh: 你有没有尝试复习英语课程？

en: Can you make yourself understood in English?
zh: 你能用英语表达清楚吗？

en: You can't speak English, can you?
zh: 你不会说英语，是吗？

en: He asked me if I could speak English.
zh: 他问我是否会说英语。

en: You can speak English well, can you not?
zh: 你能说一口流利的英语，不是吗？

en: Thousands of people died of hunger.
zh: 成千上万的人死于饥饿。

en: Thousands of Americans have a hard time keeping the wolf from the door.
zh: 成千上万的美国人生活艰难，勉强糊口。

en: Some boats are on the lake.
zh: 湖面上有一些船。

en: As the centuries went by and England became more crowded, the people found their food supply a great problem.
zh: 随着时间的推移，英格兰变得越来越拥挤，人们发现食物供应成了一个大问题。

en: How many staff members filed to change departments?
zh: 有多少员工申请调换部门？

en: How many people in your party?
zh: 你们一行几位？

en: No man can be a patriot on an empty stomach.
zh: 人若肚子空空，就谈不上爱国。

en: No man is the wiser for his learning.
zh: 学问再多，人未必更聪明。

en: No one can be more wise than destiny.
zh: 没有人能比命运更聪明。

en: How many people are in this room?
zh: 这个房间里有多少人？

en: How many children do you have?
zh: 你有几个孩子？

en: How many people are there on the payroll?
zh: 工资单上有多少人？

en: How many engineers took part in the conference?
zh: 有多少工程师参加了会议？

en: How many people?
zh: 多少人？

en: Let no one appropriate a common benefit.
zh: 不要让任何人侵占公共利益。

en: How many people do you think have an ear for music?
zh: 你认为有多少人有音乐天赋？

en: Some were late.
zh: 有些人迟到了。

en: How many people are now living in poverty?
zh: 现在有多少人生活在贫困中？

en: Some brave passengers caught the pickpocket and turned him over to the police.
zh: 一些勇敢的乘客抓住了扒手，并把他交给了警察。

en: We ought to expect some casual visitors.
zh: 我们应该会迎来一些不速之客。

en: Some boys came into the classroom.
zh: 一些男孩走进了教室。

en: Some people tried to dig the treasure out, but they couldn't.
zh: 有些人试图把宝藏挖出来，但他们没能成功。

en: Several people have been accused of breaking the law.
zh: 有几个人被指控违法。

en: Some children brought peanut butter sandwiches, some ham, and others cheese.
zh: 一些孩子带了花生酱三明治，一些带了火腿，还有一些带了奶酪。

en: Some of the boys are fishing and the others are swimming.
zh: 一些男孩在钓鱼，另一些在游泳。

en: An old oak is groaning in the storm.
zh: 暴风雨中，一棵老橡树在呻吟。

en: Don't buy things on credit.
zh: 不要赊购东西。

en: Hang your coat on the hook.
zh: 把你的外套挂在挂钩上。

en: The sum came to over 20,000 yen.
zh: 总额超过两万日元。

en: My forehead burned with fever.
zh: 我的额头发烧了。

en: Wipe the sweat from your brow.
zh: 擦去你额头上的汗水。

en: Come feel my forehead.
zh: 来摸摸我的额头。

en: A high forehead is indicative of great mental power.
zh: 高额头预示着强大的脑力。

en: The frame itself is worth more than the picture.
zh: 画框本身比画更值钱。

en: The sweat was dripping off my brow.
zh: 汗水从我的额头上滴下来。

en: The band played marvellously under the baton of a new conductor.
zh: 在新指挥的指挥棒下，乐队演奏得非常精彩。

en: The band played several marches.
zh: 乐队演奏了几首进行曲。

en: The band sprang into life.
zh: 乐队突然活跃起来。

en: The band paraded the streets.
zh: 乐队在街上游行。

en: The band played for the visiting monarch.
zh: 乐队为来访的君主演奏。

en: A band led the parade through the city.
zh: 一个乐队带领着游行队伍穿过城市。

en: It's a piece of cake.
zh: 这简直是小菜一碟。

en: Do you play a musical instrument?
zh: 你会演奏乐器吗？

en: Some learned to play musical instruments.
zh: 有些人学会了演奏乐器。

en: The optimist looks into a mirror and becomes more optimistic, the pessimist more pessimistic.
zh: 乐观主义者照镜子会变得更乐观，悲观主义者会变得更悲观。

en: After a storm comes a calm.
zh: 雨过天晴。

en: Easy come, easy go.
zh: 来得容易，去得快。

en: It was easy for me to solve the problem.
zh: 我很容易就解决了这个问题。

en: Have fun.
zh: 玩得开心。

en: Have a nice time.
zh: 祝你玩得愉快。

en: We work by the day.
zh: 我们按天计酬。

en: We have kept in constant touch for twenty years.
zh: 二十年来，我们一直保持着密切联系。

en: We are entitled to vote at the age of twenty.
zh: 我们年满二十岁就有权投票。

en: We weighed one opinion against the other.
zh: 我们权衡了各种意见。

en: We are confronted with a difficult situation.
zh: 我们面临着一个困难的局面。

en: We learn to read and write.
zh: 我们学习阅读和写作。

en: We found that we had lost our way.
zh: 我们发现我们迷路了。

en: We hold the same principles.
zh: 我们秉持相同的原则。

en: We gave you credit for more sense than that.
zh: 我们以为你比那更有头脑。

en: We found the stolen bag in this bush.
zh: 我们在这灌木丛里找到了被盗的包。

en: We lack an incentive for pursuing the eastern market.
zh: 我们缺乏开拓东方市场的动力。

en: We decided by vote.
zh: 我们通过投票决定。

en: We selected the chairman by a vote.
zh: 我们通过投票选举了主席。

en: We took a ferry from the island to the mainland.
zh: 我们从岛上乘渡轮到大陆。

en: We met along the way.
zh: 我们在路上相遇。

en: We talked on the telephone.
zh: 我们通过电话交谈。

en: We spent our holiday exploring rural France.
zh: 我们花了假期的时间探索法国乡村。

en: We must have respect for tradition.
zh: 我们必须尊重传统。

en: We had better utilize our natural resources.
zh: 我们最好利用我们的自然资源。

en: We postponed our picnic pending a change in the weather.
zh: 我们推迟了野餐，等待天气好转。

en: We must try to conserve our natural resources.
zh: 我们必须努力保护我们的自然资源。

en: We prevailed over our enemy.
zh: 我们战胜了我们的敌人。

en: We contracted to build a railway.
zh: 我们签订了修建铁路的合同。

en: We crept toward the enemy.
zh: 我们悄悄地向敌人靠近。

en: We took the enemy by surprise.
zh: 我们打了敌人一个措手不及。

en: We waited up for him until two o'clock and then finally went to bed.
zh: 我们一直等到他两点才睡觉。

en: We delegated him to negotiate with them.
zh: 我们委托他与他们谈判。

en: We invited him to the dinner party.
zh: 我们邀请他参加晚宴。

en: We appointed him as our representative.
zh: 我们任命他为我们的代表。

en: We argued him into going.
zh: 我们说服他去了。

en: We assume that he is honest.
zh: 我们认为他是诚实的。

en: We number him among our closest friends.
zh: 我们把他算作我们最亲密的朋友之一。

en: We must help him immediately.
zh: 我们必须立即帮助他。

en: We look up to him as our leader.
zh: 我们把他视为我们的领导者。

en: We should follow his example.
zh: 我们应该以他为榜样。

en: We elected him to be mayor.
zh: 我们选举他为市长。

en: We banished him from the country.
zh: 我们把他驱逐出境。

en: It appears to me that we misunderstand him.
zh: 在我看来，我们误解了他。

en: We have lost sight of him.
zh: 我们已经失去了他的踪迹。

en: We tried to cheer him up by taking him out.
zh: 我们试图带他出去玩来让他高兴起来。

en: We elected him as our Representative.
zh: 我们选举他为我们的代表。

en: We looked down on him as a coward.
zh: 我们把他看作一个懦夫。

en: We look up to him as a good senior.
zh: 我们把他看作一位优秀的前辈。

en: We must not give way to their demands.
zh: 我们绝不能屈服于他们的要求。

en: We had to yield to their request.
zh: 我们不得不屈服于他们的要求。

en: We thought their shop was a failure, but now they've gotten out from under and even expanded.
zh: 我们原以为他们的商店会倒闭，但现在他们已经摆脱困境，甚至还扩大了规模。

en: We will give them moral support.
zh: 我们将给予他们精神上的支持。

en: We provided them with money and clothes.
zh: 我们为他们提供了金钱和衣服。

en: We went to court when they refused to pay for the damage.
zh: 当他们拒绝赔偿损失时，我们去法院起诉了他们。

en: We were unable to follow his logic.
zh: 我们无法理解他的逻辑。

en: You can number me among your friends.
zh: 你可以把我算作你的朋友。

en: What on earth did you take me for?
zh: 你到底把我当成什么人了？

en: You are the wickedest witty person I know.
zh: 你是我认识的最邪恶也最风趣的人。

en: You need not have helped my son with his homework.
zh: 你本不必帮我儿子做作业的。

en: You may use my new car.
zh: 你可以用我的新车。

en: You must do as I tell you.
zh: 你必须按我说的做。

en: You are to do as I tell you.
zh: 你必须按我说的做。

en: Are you for or against my plan?
zh: 你赞成还是反对我的计划？

en: You are welcome to the use of my yacht.
zh: 你可以随意使用我的游艇。

en: You have no claim on me.
zh: 你对我没有任何要求权。

en: I wish you had told me the truth.
zh: 我真希望你告诉过我真相。

en: You should have told me the truth.
zh: 你本应该告诉我的真相。

en: You lied to me, didn't you?
zh: 你对我撒谎了，不是吗？

en: I think you had better stay with us.
zh: 我想你最好和我们待在一起。

en: You ought to have come to our party.
zh: 你本应该来参加我们的聚会。

en: You insist upon our taking that course of action.
zh: 你坚持要我们采取那样的行动。

en: You are to stay here until we come back.
zh: 你必须待在这里直到我们回来。

en: All you have to do is to wait for me to return.
zh: 你所要做的就是等我回来。

en: You don't know how worried I am.
zh: 你不知道我有多担心。

en: You had better do as I suggest.
zh: 你最好按我建议的做。

en: Can you imagine me making a cake?
zh: 你能想象我做蛋糕吗？

en: You have only to follow the directions.
zh: 你只需要按照指示去做。

en: You must learn to obey instructions.
zh: 你必须学会服从指令。

en: You finally succeeded in getting a job.
zh: 你终于成功找到了一份工作。

en: You are frustrated with your work.
zh: 你对你的工作感到沮丧。

en: Your argument is not any more convincing than that of my stubborn father.
zh: 你的论点并不比我那固执的父亲的更有说服力。

en: Please lend me your car.
zh: 请把你的车借给我用一下。

en: Pull your car out a bit, I can't back my car out.
zh: 把你的车稍微挪出来一点，我的车倒不出去。

en: Would you mind lending me your car?
zh: 你介意把你的车借给我用一下吗？

en: Your car makes too much noise. You should have it looked at.
zh: 你的车噪音太大了，你应该去检查一下。

en: Give me a lift in your car.
zh: 用你的车送我一程。

en: Compared with yours, my car is small.
zh: 和你的车相比，我的车很小。

en: What have you done with your car?
zh: 你把你的车弄到哪里去了？

en: It is important that you attach your photo to the application form.
zh: 请务必将您的照片附在申请表上。

en: May I take your picture?
zh: 我可以拍张你的照片吗？

en: I would like your picture.
zh: 我想要一张你的照片。

en: Your question does not bear on the subject under discussion.
zh: 你的问题与我们讨论的主题无关。

en: Your question is not relevant to the subject.
zh: 你的问题与主题无关。

en: Your questions were too direct.
zh: 你的问题太直接了。

en: Your question is hard for me to answer.
zh: 你的问题让我很难回答。

en: You have Jim to thank for your failure.
zh: 你的失败要归咎于吉姆。

en: Will you lend me your dictionary?
zh: 你可以把你的字典借给我吗？

en: May I borrow your dictionary?
zh: 我可以借用你的字典吗？

en: Look up the definition of 'guy' in your dictionary.
zh: 在你的字典里查一下'guy'的定义。

en: Look up the words in your dictionary.
zh: 在你的字典里查一下这些单词。

en: Could you lend me your bicycle for a couple of days?
zh: 你可以把你的自行车借给我几天吗？

en: Your bicycle is similar to mine.
zh: 你的自行车和我的很相似。

en: Your bike is better than mine.
zh: 你的自行车比我的好。

en: Is your watch correct?
zh: 你的手表准吗？

en: Your watch seems to be very valuable.
zh: 你的手表看起来很值钱。

en: We balloted for the resolution.
zh: 我们对该决议进行了投票。

en: We must carry out that plan.
zh: 我们必须执行那个计划。

en: We talked over the plan with him.
zh: 我们和他讨论了那个计划。

en: We voted against the bill.
zh: 我们投票反对该法案。

en: We obeyed the rules.
zh: 我们遵守了规则。

en: We were talking to each other all the time.
zh: 我们一直都在互相交谈。

en: We gave the performer a clap.
zh: 我们为表演者鼓了掌。

en: We saw the film and had dinner together.
zh: 我们一起看了电影，吃了晚饭。

en: We confirmed the hotel reservations by telephone.
zh: 我们通过电话确认了酒店预订。

en: The whole building has been put at our disposal.
zh: 整栋大楼都供我们使用。

en: We were surprised at the news.
zh: 我们对这个消息感到惊讶。

en: We must look into the matter at once.
zh: 我们必须立即调查此事。

en: We made him go there.
zh: 我们让他去那里。

en: We began to see what we can deduce from it.
zh: 我们开始明白我们可以从中推断出什么。

en: We gathered all the books together and put them in the spare room.
zh: 我们把所有的书都收集起来，放在了空余的房间里。

en: We have to abolish all nuclear weapons, because they are deadly to mankind.
zh: 我们必须废除所有核武器，因为它们对人类是致命的。

en: We got all the materials together.
zh: 我们把所有的材料都收集起来了。

en: We have left undone what we ought to have done.
zh: 我们没有做我们应该做的事情。

en: We have come a long way.
zh: 我们已经走了很长的路。

en: We have to start at once.
zh: 我们必须立即开始。

en: We received an immediate answer to our letter.
zh: 我们收到了对我们信件的立即回复。

en: After much debate, we decided to spend our holidays in Spain.
zh: 经过多次辩论，我们决定在西班牙度假。

en: We elected Mr Jordan chairperson.
zh: 我们选举乔丹先生为主席。

en: We chopped our way through the jungle.
zh: 我们砍伐开路，穿过了丛林。

en: We sat up half the night just talking.
zh: 我们熬了半个晚上只是在聊天。

en: A foreign language cannot be mastered in a year or so.
zh: 一门外语不是一年半载就能掌握的。

en: I will show you a new approach to foreign language learning.
zh: 我会向你展示一种新的外语学习方法。

en: Mastering a foreign language calls for patience.
zh: 掌握一门外语需要耐心。

en: Mastering a foreign language involves a lot of patience.
zh: 掌握一门外语需要很大的耐心。

en: Regular attendance is important in a foreign language class.
zh: 在语言课上，经常出勤很重要。

en: Are you interested in foreign languages?
zh: 你对外语感兴趣吗？

en: It's by no means easy to master a foreign language.
zh: 掌握一门外语绝非易事。

en: It's difficult to feel at home in a foreign language.
zh: 很难在外语中找到宾至如归的感觉。

en: Speaking of foreign languages, can you speak French?
zh: 说到外语，你会说法语吗？

en: Isn't it difficult to make yourself understood in a foreign language?
zh: 用外语表达清楚自己的意思是不是很难？

en: It is so good to be able to speak a number of foreign languages.
zh: 能够说多种外语真是太好了。

en: Some knowledge of foreign languages, of Spanish in particular, is essential.
zh: 掌握一些外语知识，特别是西班牙语，是必不可少的。

en: Traveling abroad is very interesting.
zh: 出国旅行非常有趣。

en: The best way to know a foreign country is to go there yourself.
zh: 了解一个外国最好的方法就是亲自去那里。

en: The very idea of being sent abroad delighted them.
zh: 仅仅是被派往国外的想法就让他们很高兴。

en: The good way to know a foreign country is to go there.
zh: 了解一个外国的好方法就是去那里。

en: It is not until you go abroad that you realize how small Japan is.
zh: 只有出国后你才会意识到日本是多么的小。

en: He had not been abroad for one month before he was taken ill.
zh: 他出国不到一个月就病倒了。

en: You should avail yourself of the chance to go abroad.
zh: 你应该利用好出国旅行的机会。

en: Have you been abroad?
zh: 你去过国外吗？

en: The number of people who go abroad has been increasing.
zh: 出国旅行的人数一直在增加。

en: He took his daughter with him whenever he went abroad.
zh: 他每次出国都会带上他的女儿。

en: Visiting a foreign country must be expensive.
zh: 去国外旅行一定很贵。

en: Do people behave differently when they go abroad?
zh: 人们出国后行为举止会有所不同吗？

en: Mary's dream of going abroad finally became a reality.
zh: 玛丽出国旅行的梦想终于实现了。

en: It's so comfortable here, I really feel at home.
zh: 这里真舒服，我感觉就像在自己家一样。

en: An izakaya is a Japanese style pub.
zh: 居酒屋是日式酒吧。

en: We're doing the same old routine: going bar hopping and then to karaoke.
zh: 我们还是老一套：先去酒吧，然后去卡拉OK。

en: Those who were present were disappointed at the report.
zh: 出席的人对报告感到失望。

en: Those present were all moved to tears.
zh: 在场的人都感动得流下了眼泪。

en: Those present were surprised at the news.
zh: 在场的人对这个消息感到惊讶。

en: The living room adjoins the dining room.
zh: 客厅和餐厅相连。

en: When I was playing video games in the living room, Mother asked me if I would go shopping with her.
zh: 我在客厅玩电子游戏的时候，妈妈问我是否愿意和她一起去购物。

en: I had an operation for glaucoma last year.
zh: 我去年做了青光眼手术。

en: I had a miscarriage last year.
zh: 我去年流产了。

en: I had a stroke last year.
zh: 我去年中风了。

en: I had otitis media last year.
zh: 我去年得了中耳炎。

en: I delivered my first child last year.
zh: 我去年生了第一个孩子。

en: I put on a little weight last year.
zh: 我去年长胖了一点。

en: I lost my wife last year.
zh: 我去年失去了我的妻子。

en: I took an art class last year.
zh: 我去年上了一门艺术课。

en: Having failed last year, I don't like to try again.
zh: 因为去年失败了，我不想再尝试了。

en: Thanks to the amusement park built last year, the city has become popular.
zh: 多亏了去年建成的游乐园，这座城市变得受欢迎起来。

en: We could go out together like we did last year.
zh: 我们可以像去年一样一起出去玩。

en: Mr Brown took charge of this class last year.
zh: 布朗先生去年负责这个班级。

en: There was a sharp rise in prices last year.
zh: 去年物价大幅上涨。

en: The crops failed last year.
zh: 去年庄稼歉收了。

en: We had a lot of snow last year.
zh: 去年我们下了很多雪。

en: We had a lot of rain last year.
zh: 去年我们下了很多雨。

en: We had frequent snowfalls last year.
zh: 去年我们经常下雪。

en: Move over a little if you please.
zh: 请您稍微挪动一下。

en: Would you be kind enough to explain it to me?
zh: 您能好心给我解释一下吗？

en: Sorry, we're full today.
zh: 对不起，我们今天客满了。

en: Would you mind opening the window?
zh: 您介意打开窗户吗？

en: Would you be so kind as to post my letter?
zh: 您能帮我寄一下这封信吗？

en: I'm sorry, but he isn't home.
zh: 很抱歉，他不在家。

en: Please make certain your seat belt is fastened.
zh: 请务必系好安全带。

en: Excuse me, but let me have another look at the photo.
zh: 打扰一下，请让我再看一眼照片。

en: Don't be afraid.
zh: 别害怕。

en: It will be fine weather tomorrow, perhaps.
zh: 明天也许会是好天气。

en: She is probably over forty.
zh: 她大概四十多岁了。

en: It is probable that he will win the speech contest.
zh: 他很可能会赢得演讲比赛。

en: I am afraid to jump over the ditch.
zh: 我害怕跳过这条沟。

en: The bold man glanced at the gangster with hatred and contempt.
zh: 那个大胆的人带着憎恨和轻蔑瞥了那个歹徒一眼。

en: The heat is intense.
zh: 天气非常炎热。

en: There's nothing to be afraid of.
zh: 没什么好害怕的。

en: Mr. Satoyama's work made a big impression in the world of haiku.
zh: 里山先生的作品在俳句界引起了很大的反响。

en: Flying against a strong wind is very difficult.
zh: 逆风飞行非常困难。

en: The strong wind died away at night.
zh: 强风在夜里减弱了。

en: Strong winds stripped the tree of its leaves.
zh: 强风把树上的叶子都吹掉了。

en: The strong wind indicates that a storm is coming.
zh: 强风预示着暴风雨即将来临。

en: Passing through the strong wind, the planes rock like this, but don't worry.
zh: 穿过强风时，飞机这样摇晃，但别担心。

en: The strong wind cut the electric wires in several places.
zh: 强风在几个地方切断了电线。

en: They say we're going to get high winds.
zh: 他们说我们要刮大风了。

en: Fanned by a strong wind, the fire spread in an instant.
zh: 在强风的助长下，火势瞬间蔓延开来。

en: All of you are diligent.
zh: 你们都很努力。

en: You must start at once.
zh: 你们必须立刻开始。

en: It is imperative for you to act at once.
zh: 你们必须立刻行动。

en: You must study hard and learn many things.
zh: 你们必须努力学习，学很多东西。

en: All you have to do is to learn this sentence by heart.
zh: 你们要做的就是把这个句子背下来。

en: Are you students at this school?
zh: 你们是这所学校的学生吗？

en: You have to share the cake equally.
zh: 你们必须把蛋糕平分。

en: You should know what to read.
zh: 你们应该知道读什么。

en: Compare your translation with the one on the blackboard.
zh: 把你的翻译和黑板上的比较一下。

en: Compare your sentence with the one on the blackboard.
zh: 把你的句子和黑板上的比较一下。

en: Who is your teacher?
zh: 谁是你们的老师？

en: What was the cause of your quarrel?
zh: 你们争吵的原因是什么？

en: I don't approve your decision.
zh: 我不赞成你的决定。

en: I wonder which of you will win.
zh: 我想知道你们谁会赢。

en: There are merits and demerits to both your opinions so I'm not going to decide right away which to support.
zh: 你们的意见都有优点和缺点，所以我不会马上决定支持哪一个。

en: Your team is stronger than ours.
zh: 你们的队伍比我们的强。

en: Any of you can do it.
zh: 你们任何人都可以做到。

en: Which of you came here first?
zh: 你们谁先来的？

en: Did any of you gentlemen wait on this man?
zh: 你们哪位先生招待过这个人吗？

en: I think I might join you, but I haven't decided yet.
zh: 我想我可能会加入你们，但我还没决定。

en: You've got no alibi for the day of the murder.
zh: 在谋杀那天，你没有任何不在场的证明。

en: Just as you treat me, so I will treat you.
zh: 你怎样待我，我就怎样待你。

en: If you're going to the beach, count me in.
zh: 如果你们要去海滩，算我一个。

en: When will you complete the preparations?
zh: 你们什么时候完成准备工作？

en: Boys, don't make any noise.
zh: 孩子们，不要吵闹。

en: Education means something more than going to school.
zh: 教育的意义不仅仅是上学。

en: Education should not be a burden on the parents as well as on the children.
zh: 教育不应该成为父母和孩子的负担。

en: Teaching is learning.
zh: 教学相长。

en: Teaching asks for a lot of patience.
zh: 教学需要很大的耐心。

en: With teaching and studying my time is taken up.
zh: 我所有的时间都用来教学和学习了。

en: They learn to do without being taught.
zh: 他们无师自通。

en: Where did you go for that 30 minutes you were gone?
zh: 你刚才消失的那三十分钟去哪儿了？

en: Thank you for the information.
zh: 谢谢你的信息。

en: Kyoko went away, humming a song.
zh: 京子哼着歌走了。

en: Dinosaurs are now extinct.
zh: 恐龙现在已经灭绝了。

en: Fear always springs from ignorance.
zh: 恐惧总是源于无知。

en: Fear robbed him of speech.
zh: 恐惧使他失去了说话的能力。

en: His legs were trembling from fear.
zh: 他的腿因恐惧而颤抖。

en: Sorry, but can you show me the way to the next village?
zh: 不好意思，请问去下一个村庄怎么走？

en: May I make so bold as to request your assistance?
zh: 我可以冒昧地请求您的帮助吗？

en: Will you kindly come here at nine?
zh: 请您九点到这里来好吗？

en: I am very sorry, but I must cancel our appointment for February 27.
zh: 非常抱歉，我必须取消2月27日的约会。

en: I'm afraid you have to work overtime.
zh: 恐怕你得加班了。

en: The victim of blackmail has been paying hush money for years, but now he realizes it is foolish, and he has decided not to pay a red cent more.
zh: 勒索的受害者多年来一直在支付封口费，但现在他意识到这是愚蠢的，他决定不再支付一分钱。

en: Fear crept into my heart and settled there.
zh: 恐惧悄悄地进入我的内心并扎根在那里。

en: It's awfully cold today.
zh: 今天真是太冷了。

en: It's awfully cold this evening.
zh: 今天晚上真是太冷了。

en: A fearful thought entered my mind.
zh: 一个可怕的想法进入了我的脑海。

en: A terrible fate awaited him.
zh: 一个可怕的命运在等待着他。

en: Would you please open the window?
zh: 请你打开窗户好吗？

en: The question before us is an urgent one.
zh: 我们面前的问题非常紧迫。

en: Our city sits on an active fault.
zh: 我们的城市坐落在一个活跃的断层上。

en: There are none of us who do not respect his honesty.
zh: 我们当中没有人不尊重他的诚实。

en: We have a traitor among us.
zh: 我们当中有一个叛徒。

en: Insofar as we know, he is guilty.
zh: 就我们所知，他是有罪的。

en: Our representative argued against the new tax plan.
zh: 我们的代表反对新的税收计划。

en: Our mutual understanding is indispensable.
zh: 我们彼此的理解是不可或缺的。

en: Only a handful of activists are articulate in our union.
zh: 在我们的工会中，只有少数积极分子能言善辩。

en: Our class consists of fifty boys.
zh: 我们班由五十个男生组成。

en: We have many difficulties before us.
zh: 我们面前有很多困难。

en: Our boat drifted to shore on the tide.
zh: 我们的船随着潮水漂到了岸边。

en: Our advance was checked.
zh: 我们的前进受到了阻碍。

en: Our boat followed a school of fish.
zh: 我们的船跟随一群鱼。

en: Our boat approached the small island.
zh: 我们的船靠近了那个小岛。

en: Our ancestors knew how to read the stars.
zh: 我们的祖先知道如何观测星象。

en: Our teacher is at once stern and kindly.
zh: 我们的老师既严厉又慈祥。

en: Our teacher is stern to us.
zh: 我们的老师对我们很严厉。

en: Our lives are determined by our environment.
zh: 我们的生活由我们的环境决定。

en: Our arrival at Narita was delayed by an hour.
zh: 我们到达成田机场的时间延误了一个小时。

en: Our success depends on whether he helps us or not.
zh: 我们的成功取决于他是否帮助我们。

en: Our success was due in part to good luck.
zh: 我们的成功部分归功于好运。

en: Our success depends upon whether you will help us or not.
zh: 我们的成功取决于你是否愿意帮助我们。

en: Our character is affected by the environment.
zh: 我们的性格受到环境的影响。

en: Our world is only one small part of the universe.
zh: 我们的世界只是宇宙中很小的一部分。

en: Are there other universes outside our own?
zh: 在我们的宇宙之外还有其他的宇宙吗？

en: Smoking has a great deal to do with cancer.
zh: 吸烟和癌症有很大关系。

en: It's foolish to think that smoking has little to do with cancer.
zh: 认为吸烟与癌症无关的想法是愚蠢的。

en: Smoking does damage your lungs.
zh: 吸烟确实会损害你的肺。

en: Smoking does you more harm than good.
zh: 吸烟对你弊大于利。

en: Smoking is bad for you.
zh: 吸烟对你不好。

en: The habit of smoking is very difficult to get rid of.
zh: 吸烟的习惯很难改掉。

en: I wish I could break the habit of smoking.
zh: 我希望我能戒掉吸烟的习惯。

en: Smokers are as aware as anybody else of the disadvantages of their hobby, but manage to live with that knowledge for two main reasons.
zh: 吸烟者和其他人一样清楚他们的爱好带来的坏处，但他们设法带着这些知识生活，主要有两个原因。

en: Some people find it easier to grasp the short-term effects of smoking.
zh: 有些人觉得更容易理解吸烟的短期影响。

en: Short-term effects of smoking include unfitness, wheezing, a general vulnerability to illness, bad breath, bad skin and so on.
zh: 吸烟的短期影响包括身体不适、喘息、容易生病、口臭、皮肤不好等等。

en: Most people killed by smoking were not heavy smokers.
zh: 大多数因吸烟而死的人并不是重度吸烟者。

en: Is there a link between smoking and lung cancer?
zh: 吸烟和肺癌之间有联系吗？

en: There is no denying the fact that smoking is harmful.
zh: 不可否认的是，吸烟是有害的。

en: Smoking has affected his lungs.
zh: 吸烟影响了他的肺。

en: Smoking is responsible for many cases of lung cancer.
zh: 吸烟是许多肺癌病例的原因。

en: It is a fact that smoking is bad for health.
zh: 吸烟有害健康是一个事实。

en: It is a fact that smoking is a danger to health.
zh: 吸烟对健康是一种危害，这是一个事实。

en: We have absolute proof that smoking is bad for your health.
zh: 我们有绝对的证据表明吸烟对你的健康有害。

en: Smoking or health, the choice is yours.
zh: 吸烟还是健康，由你选择。

en: Yoshio helped me lift the box up.
zh: 吉雄帮我把箱子抬起来了。

en: Yoshino is a place famous for its cherry blossoms.
zh: 吉野是一个以樱花闻名的地方。

en: Mr Yoshimoto taught us many trivial matters.
zh: 吉本先生教了我们很多琐碎的事情。

en: Mr Yoshida directed me to come at once.
zh: 吉田先生指示我立即来。

en: Mr Yoshida never breaks his promise.
zh: 吉田先生从不违背他的承诺。

en: Mr Yoshida is at home in French history.
zh: 吉田先生精通法国历史。

en: The reason why you failed is you did not try hard enough.
zh: 你失败的原因是你不够努力。

en: When you speak of a pay-raise before recognition, I am inclined to think you are putting the cart before the horse.
zh: 如果你在获得认可之前就谈论加薪，我倾向于认为你是本末倒置。

en: A time will come when you will regret your action.
zh: 你会后悔你的所作所为的。

en: You may as well go yourself.
zh: 你还不如自己去。

en: You should talk to the teacher yourself.
zh: 你应该自己和老师谈谈。

en: You talk next and you be quiet.
zh: 你下一个说，然后安静。

en: We heard the news that you had passed the exam.
zh: 我们听说你通过了考试。

en: I think it's a pity you could not come to our party.
zh: 我觉得很遗憾你没能来参加我们的聚会。

en: I don't like you any more than you like me.
zh: 我喜欢你并不比你喜欢我多。

en: I love you more than you love me.
zh: 我爱你胜过你爱我。

en: Either you or I must go in his place.
zh: 要么你，要么我，必须代替他去。

en: What's the reason that made you call me?
zh: 你打电话给我的原因是什么？

en: What is it that you want me to do?
zh: 你想要我做什么？

en: I can't thank you enough for what you did for me.
zh: 我非常感谢你为我所做的一切。

en: I hope you will join us in the parade and march along the street.
zh: 我希望你能加入我们的游行，一起走在街上。

en: I wish you could come with us.
zh: 我希望你能和我们一起来。

en: I'll look after your affairs when you are dead.
zh: 你死后我会照顾你的事务。

en: I don't have as much money as you think.
zh: 我没有你想象的那么多钱。

en: How much money did you spend in total?
zh: 你总共花了多少钱？

en: Can you account for all the money you spent?
zh: 你能说明你花的每一笔钱的去向吗？

en: I will wait until you have finished your homework.
zh: 我会等你做完作业。

en: It makes no difference whether you agree or not.
zh: 你是否同意都无关紧要。

en: With your approval, I would like to offer him the job.
zh: 如果您同意，我想给他提供这份工作。

en: It was wise of you to take your umbrella with you.
zh: 你带伞是很明智的。

en: Show me the doll that you bought yesterday.
zh: 给我看看你昨天买的娃娃。

en: It's already eleven.
zh: 已经十一点了。

en: May I talk to Mr. Brown?
zh: 我可以和布朗先生说话吗？

en: "Yes, orange juice please," Mike said.
zh: “是的，请来杯橙汁，”迈克说。

en: I always thought that suffering a heart attack was an omen of death.
zh: 我一直认为心脏病发作是死亡的预兆。

en: If you are by my side, I don't need anything else.
zh: 如果你在我身边，我什么都不需要。

en: This is silly!
zh: 这太蠢了！

en: My name's Jack.
zh: 我叫杰克。

en: I really like it.
zh: 我真的很喜欢。

en: I like it a lot.
zh: 我非常喜欢。

en: Shall we meet tomorrow?
zh: 我们明天见面好吗？

en: Would you like to meet tomorrow?
zh: 你明天想见面吗？

en: What time do you have?
zh: 现在几点了？

en: What time is it?
zh: 现在几点了？

en: Where do you come from?
zh: 你从哪里来？

en: Where are you from?
zh: 你是哪里人？

en: What is your name?
zh: 你叫什么名字？

en: What's your name?
zh: 你叫什么名字？

en: It's not my fault.
zh: 这不是我的错。

en: Is there a youth hostel around here?
zh: 这附近有青年旅社吗？

en: I agree with you.
zh: 我同意你的观点。

en: I agree.
zh: 我同意。

en: Leave me alone!
zh: 别烦我！

en: Leave me alone.
zh: 别烦我。

en: How old are you?
zh: 你多大了？

en: It's very hot today.
zh: 今天很热。

en: Please turn over.
zh: 请翻身。

en: The footnotes are at the bottom of the page.
zh: 脚注在页面的底部。

en: Footnotes are notes at the foot of a page.
zh: 脚注是位于页面底部的注释。

en: Throw away the chairs whose legs are broken.
zh: 把那些腿坏了的椅子扔掉。

en: I'll be about again when my leg heals.
zh: 等我的腿好了，我就又能到处走了。

en: The guests wished the happy couple a long and prosperous life.
zh: 客人们祝这对幸福的夫妇生活幸福美满。

en: A flight attendant walks up to the boys.
zh: 一位空乘人员走向那些男孩。

en: From an objective viewpoint, his argument was far from rational.
zh: 从客观的角度来看，他的论点远非理性。

en: The visitor sat across from me.
zh: 来访者坐在我的对面。

en: Guests arrived by twos and threes.
zh: 客人们三三两两地到达。

en: The guests are all gone.
zh: 客人都走了。

en: The customer did not come.
zh: 顾客没有来。

en: Customers stopped coming to our shop.
zh: 顾客不再光顾我们的商店了。

en: The number of guests is 20.
zh: 客人的数量是20。

en: You should prepare a room for the visitor.
zh: 你应该为来访者准备一个房间。

en: I saw some of the guests leave the banquet room.
zh: 我看到一些客人离开了宴会厅。

en: She was pleased to be treated as a guest.
zh: 她很高兴被当作客人对待。

en: The visitors were greeted with warm handshakes.
zh: 来访者受到了热烈的握手欢迎。

en: When the visitor entered the room, we stood to greet him.
zh: 当来访者进入房间时，我们站起来迎接他。

en: I've lost my filling.
zh: 我的补牙掉了。

en: This tooth has to have a filling.
zh: 这颗牙需要补一下。

en: As I entered the café, I found two young men watching a wrestling match on television.
zh: 当我走进咖啡馆时，我发现两个年轻人正在看电视上的摔跤比赛。

en: As I entered a tearoom, I found two young men watching a wrestling match on television.
zh: 当我走进一家茶馆时，我发现两个年轻人正在看电视上的摔跤比赛。

en: I asked for a seat in the smoking section.
zh: 我要求坐在吸烟区。

en: Smoking, please.
zh: 吸烟区。

en: The Representative said he will put a brake on spending.
zh: 这位代表说他会控制支出。

en: The House cut the budget for foreign aid.
zh: 众议院削减了对外援助的预算。

en: The Congressmen rammed the bill through committee.
zh: 国会议员们在委员会强行通过了这项法案。

en: Go downstairs and have a wash.
zh: 下楼洗漱一下。

en: See below.
zh: 见下文。

en: Can you see something red down below?
zh: 你能看到下面有什么红色的东西吗？

en: Sign at the bottom, please.
zh: 请在底部签名。

en: Turn down the volume, please.
zh: 请把音量调小。

en: Reading aloud was a great effort to him.
zh: 大声朗读对他来说很费力。

en: What passion cannot music raise and quell?
zh: 音乐能激起和抑制什么样的激情呢？

en: I hope there are some music clubs.
zh: 我希望有一些音乐俱乐部。

en: I am interested in listening to music.
zh: 我对听音乐感兴趣。

en: Not a sound was to be heard in the concert hall.
zh: 音乐厅里听不到一点声音。

en: The concert was well attended.
zh: 这次音乐会出席人数很多。

en: The concert was a great success.
zh: 这次音乐会非常成功。

en: The concert will take place next Sunday.
zh: 音乐会将于下周日举行。

en: The concert concluded with the national anthem.
zh: 音乐会在国歌声中结束。

en: There were many late arrivals at the concert.
zh: 音乐会迟到的人很多。

en: The musician shook his head and pushed his little piano away.
zh: 音乐家摇了摇头，把他的小钢琴推开了。

en: A musician can appreciate small differences in sounds.
zh: 音乐家可以欣赏声音中的细微差别。

en: Musicians are usually sensitive to criticism.
zh: 音乐家通常对批评很敏感。

en: Did you come from a musical family?
zh: 你来自一个音乐世家吗？

en: The musician left his family poor.
zh: 这位音乐家去世后，他的家人很穷。

en: Do you know when the musician will come here?
zh: 你知道这位音乐家什么时候来这里吗？

en: Who that understands music could say his playing was good?
zh: 谁懂音乐会说他演奏得好呢？

en: In the film, the director makes Hamlet an active person.
zh: 在电影中，导演将哈姆雷特塑造成一个积极主动的人。

en: The supervisor enforced the rules here in this factory.
zh: 主管在这家工厂里强制执行规章制度。

en: You must act under the leadership of your supervisor.
zh: 你必须在你的主管的领导下行动。

en: He left his team as he could not get along with the manager.
zh: 他离开了他的团队，因为他与经理相处不来。

en: Sugar replaced honey as a sweetener.
zh: 糖取代蜂蜜成为一种甜味剂。

en: You shouldn't expect things to be easy.
zh: 你不应该期望事情会很容易。

en: I want something sweet.
zh: 我想要一些甜的东西。

en: Some are deceived by fair words.
zh: 有些人被花言巧语所欺骗。

en: Do you care for sweets?
zh: 你喜欢甜食吗？

en: I can't resist sweet things.
zh: 我无法抗拒甜的东西。

en: Sweet scents are borne on soft breezes.
zh: 甜美的香味随着柔和的微风飘来。

en: Too many sweets cause your teeth to decay.
zh: 太多的甜食会导致蛀牙。

en: You shouldn't let children eat too many sweets.
zh: 你不应该让孩子们吃太多的甜食。

en: When it comes to sweets, I just can't control myself.
zh: 一说到甜食，我就控制不住自己。

en: I'm cutting down on sweets.
zh: 我正在减少甜食的摄入。

en: He's a pushover.
zh: 他是个容易被说服的人。

en: Environmental problems call for quick action.
zh: 环境问题需要迅速采取行动。

en: The environment was the focus of student council activities.
zh: 环境是学生会活动的重点。

en: The destruction of the environment is appalling.
zh: 对环境的破坏令人震惊。

en: Environmental pollution is causing abnormal weather conditions.
zh: 环境污染正在导致异常的天气状况。

en: Fear of pollution discouraged people from building homes near power plants.
zh: 对污染的恐惧阻止人们在发电厂附近建造房屋。

en: How to deal with environmental pollution is a serious matter.
zh: 如何处理环境污染是一个严肃的问题。

en: Everybody will have to pitch in to save the environment.
zh: 每个人都必须尽一份力量来拯救环境。

en: Some factories pollute the environment.
zh: 一些工厂污染环境。

en: We ought to do our best not to pollute our environment.
zh: 我们应该尽最大努力不污染我们的环境。
